resources.check: Consult an overview of Positive Future resources
resources.filterAlternativeText: Resources can also be explored with the following filters:

categoriesTexts.imagine_a_far_away_future:
Horizon 2100… that is, a few generations away. 
Imagine your daily life in version 2100, or how your grandchildren might be living.  
The same kind of human drama might still be going on at every individual level… But what will have changed compared to now?
categoriesTexts.think_about_the_future: What will the world look like tomorrow…or in 2100? Learn from today’s research and foresight scenarios
categoriesTexts.stimulate_your_creativity: A glimpse of fiction works and imaginary visions of the future.
categoriesTexts.stay_positive:
Too much literature and cinema today gives a bleak, dystopic view of the future. How can you turn this into something more positive? 
Human beings have the capacity to cope, resist, and find solutions – whether it is at the individual, community or global level.
categoriesTexts.think_of_your_ideal_city:
How would you like future cities to be like? Will they be high-tech megacities, or will there be a return to smaller size cities? 
Will cities look very different from an esthetic or material point of view? What would be an ideal city for human relationships and communities?
categoriesTexts.face_our_challenges_today: Our societies now face many challenges, which must be analysed to plan a brighter future
categoriesTexts.learn_from_the_past: What lessons for tomorrow can be learnt from past experiences, experiments or mistakes?

application.title: Submit your work
application.contact: Please indicate a contact. If you are in a group, please indicate a single contact for the whole group.
application.thank_you: Thank you for submitting your work to the Positive Future contest!
application.back_to_home: Go back to Positive Future homepage
application.description_alt:
Present in a few lines your work, your inspirations, possibly the resources you used. 
Remember! You must indicate any use of a pre-existing original work or the participation of a third party in the submitted work

dialog.title: Confirm your application
dialog.text: Your application is definitive and can not be edited once it has been submitted. If you made sure that you provided all the correct information, click on the submit button
dialog.error: Your application upload failed. Please try again or contact us

application.article_hint: Remember! Maximum 10,000 characters (including spaces), with the possibility of including illustrations.
application.video_hint: Remember! It must be maximum 10 minute-long.
application.agreed: I certify that I have read the
application.agreed_link: rules of the Positive Future contest
application.agreed_2: , that every team member is 18 years old or older and I agree to the terms and conditions of participation.

misc.credits: An inititative from Paris Institute for Advanced Study and the 2100 Foundation, with the support of the Agence nationale pour l'amélioration des conditions de travail and the Institut national de recherche et de sécurité.
